org.jetel.connection.jdbc

Class AbstractCopySQLData

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.connection.jdbc.AbstractCopySQLData
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CopySQLData
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractCopySQLData.CopyArray, AbstractCopySQLData.CopyBlob, AbstractCopySQLData.CopyBoolean, AbstractCopySQLData.CopyByte, AbstractCopySQLData.CopyDate, AbstractCopySQLData.CopyDecimal, AbstractCopySQLData.CopyInteger, AbstractCopySQLData.CopyLong, AbstractCopySQLData.CopyNumeric, AbstractCopySQLData.CopyOracleXml, AbstractCopySQLData.CopyString, AbstractCopySQLData.CopyTime, AbstractCopySQLData.CopyTimestamp

    public abstract class AbstractCopySQLData
extends java.lang.Object
implements CopySQLData
    Class for creating mappings between CloverETL's DataRecords and JDBC's ResultSets.
    It also contains inner classes for translating various CloverETL's DataField types onto JDBC types.
    Since:
    October 7, 2002

      • resetDataRecord

        public static void resetDataRecord(CopySQLData[] transMap,
                   DataRecord record)
        Assigns new instance of DataRecord to existing CopySQLData structure (array). Useful when CopySQLData (aka transmap) was created using some other DataRecord and new one needs to be used
        Parameters:
        transMap - Array of CopySQLData object - the transmap
        record - New DataRecord object to be used within transmap

      • setBatchUpdate

        public static void setBatchUpdate(CopySQLData[] transMap,
                  boolean inBatch)
        Set on/off working in batchUpdate mode. In this mode (especially on Oracle 10) we have to create new object for each setDate(), setTimestamp() statement call.
        Parameters:
        transMap -
        inBatch -

      • jetel2sqlTransMap

        public static CopySQLData[] jetel2sqlTransMap(java.util.List fieldTypes,
                              DataRecord record,
                              java.lang.String[] cloverFields,
                              JdbcSpecific jdbcSpecific)
                                       throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                              JetelException
        Creates translation array for copying data from Jetel record into Database record. It allows only certain (specified) Clover fields to be considered
        Parameters:
        fieldTypes - DJDBC field types - of the target JDBC data fields
        record - Description of the Parameter
        cloverFields - array of DataRecord record's field names which should be considered for mapping
        Returns:
        Description of the Return Value
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Description of the Exception
        JetelException - Description of the Exception

        public static CopySQLData[] jetel2sqlTransMap(java.util.List fieldTypes,
                              DataRecord record,
                              int[] cloverFields,
                              JdbcSpecific jdbcSpecific)
                                       throws java.sql.SQLException,
                                              JetelException
        Creates translation array for copying data from Jetel record into Database record. It allows only certain (specified) Clover fields to be considered
        Parameters:
        fieldTypes - JDBC field types - of the target JDBC data fields
        record - Description of the Parameter
        cloverFields - array of DataRecord record's field numbers which should be considered for mapping

        Throws:

      • jetel2sqlTransMap

        @Deprecated
public static CopySQLData[] jetel2sqlTransMap(DataRecord record,
                                         int[] cloverFields)
                                       throws JetelException
        Deprecated. 
        Creates translation array for copying data from Jetel record into Database record. It allows only certain (specified) Clover fields to be considered.
        Note: the target (JDBC) data types are guessed from Jetel field types - so use this method only as the last resort.
        Parameters:
        record -
        cloverFields - array of DataRecord record's field numbers which should be considered for mapping
        Returns:
        Throws:
        JetelException

        public static CopySQLData[] jetel2sqlTransMap(DataRecord record,
                              int[] cloverFields,
                              JdbcSpecific jdbcSpecific)
                                       throws JetelException
        Throws:
        JetelException

      • validateJetel2sqlMap

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> validateJetel2sqlMap(CopySQLData[] transMap,
                                                    java.sql.PreparedStatement statement,
                                                    DataRecordMetadata inMetadata,
                                                    JdbcSpecific jdbcSpecific)
                                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method validates translation map between clover record and prepared statement
        Parameters:
        transMap - translation map to validate
        statement - prepared statement
        inMetadata - input metadata
        jdbcSpecific - jdbc specific for checking types
        Returns:
        error message if map is invalid, null in other case
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

                                    java.sql.ResultSetMetaData sqlMeta,
                                    DataRecordMetadata outMetadata,
                                    JdbcSpecific jdbcSpecific)
                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method validates translation map between result set and clover record
        Parameters:
        transMap - translation map to validate
        sqlMeta - statement result set metadata
        outMetadata - output metadata
        jdbcSpecific - jdbc specific for checking types
        Returns:
        error message if map is invalid, null in other case

        java.sql.SQLException
